channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP SE -- SAP Biller Direct
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP SE -- SAP Biller Direct

item.title: CVE-2022-41207|2024-08-03T12:35:49.563Z -- sap%20se -- sap%20biller%20direct
item.description: SAP Biller Direct allows an unauthenticated attacker to craft a legitimate looking URL. When clicked by an unsuspecting victim, it will use an unsensitized parameter to redirect the victim to a malicious site of the attacker's choosing which can result in disclosure or modification of the victim's information.
